    Installation¶

    Major releases¶

    Major releases are distributed using pre-packed installation files for Windows and MacOS. These installation files can be downloaded from the GitHub repository.

    The Python language

    Conda releases¶

    Alternatively the software can be installed using the Conda

    Miniconda

    distribution system from the conda channel fluorescence-tools.

    Current release¶

    The current release / the development version of the software can be installed directly from the GitHub repository.
